outlined.description: Styles the select as an outlined select.

model-value.description: The value of the currently selected option.

options.description: An array of options to show to the user.

label.description: A text caption or description for the select.

fullwidth.description: Styles the select as full width select.

fixed.description: Styles the select as fixed select.

icon.description: Indicates an icon element with a leading icon.

with-leading-icon.description: Styles the select as a select with a leading icon.

helper-text-id.description: Required for the id attribute of the <ui-select-helper>.
